name: rebalancing-zkp
description: Zero-Knowledge proof system for portfolio rebalancing validation using Circom, Groth16, and ERC-8004

scripts.setup:forge: cd contracts && mkdir -p lib && cd lib && (git clone https://github.com/foundry-rs/forge-std.git 2>/dev/null || echo 'forge-std already exists')
scripts.circuit:compile: circom circuits/rebalancing.circom --r1cs --wasm --sym -o build/ && ([ -f rebalancing.r1cs ] && mv rebalancing.* build/ || true)
scripts.proof:verify: snarkjs groth16 verify build/verification_key.json build/public.json build/proof.json
scripts.verifier:export: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/rebalancing_final.zkey contracts/src/Verifier.sol
scripts.forge:build: export PATH="$HOME/.foundry/bin:$PATH" && cd contracts && forge build
scripts.forge:test: export PATH="$HOME/.foundry/bin:$PATH" && cd contracts && forge test -vvv
scripts.forge:deploy:local: export PATH="$HOME/.foundry/bin:$PATH" && cd contracts && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast && cd .. && python3 scripts/create_deployed_contracts.py
scripts.forge:deploy:sepolia: export PATH="$HOME/.foundry/bin:$PATH" && cd contracts && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url $RPC_URL_SEPOLIA --broadcast
scripts.forge:deploy:base-sepolia: export PATH="$HOME/.foundry/bin:$PATH" && cd contracts && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url $RPC_URL_BASE_SEPOLIA --broadcast
scripts.forge:clean: export PATH="$HOME/.foundry/bin:$PATH" && cd contracts && forge clean
scripts.clean:zkp: rm -rf build/*.r1cs build/*.wasm build/*.sym build/*.wtns build/*.zkey build/*.ptau build/proof.json build/public.json build/witness.json
scripts.clean: npm run clean:zkp && npm run forge:clean
